thread.title: WEATHER FORECAST: Cold and rainy, snow in the mountains
thread.title_full: WEATHER FORECAST: Cold and rainy, snow in the mountains

author: Кристина Ивановска
title: WEATHER FORECAST: Cold and rainy, snow in the mountains
text:
WEATHER FORECAST: Cold and rainy, snow in the mountains
The weather today will be cloudy and cold with rain, which will be heavy in many places. In the mountains, the rain will turn into snow. There will be a moderate to strong wind from the north. The minimum temperature will be in the range of 6 to 11, and the maximum will reach 7 to 13 degrees Celsius.
In Skopje it will be cloudy and cold with occasional rain, occasionally heavier. Moderate to strong winds will blow from the north. The minimum temperature will be 10, and the maximum will only reach 11 degrees Celsius.
According to the announcements from the Hydrometeorological Administration (HMA), tomorrow there will be rain, and in the mountains and in some of the higher places there will be snow. A significant snow cover will form in the mountains, and in the higher places a smaller one. A moderate to strong northerly wind will blow. From Saturday the weather will be stable with low morning temperatures, and daytime temperatures will increase.
